website_summaries.verdict: A test kit that is more than 99% accurate in detecting various drugs.
pros: Uses the same science as a lab screen test for accurate results
Works quickly, with results in just one minute
Ideal for home, workplace, or school drug testing
cons: Test results sometimes are tough to read

customer_reviews.title: Pass, Pass, Pass, Pass, Fail!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a faint line on Thursday morning first pee. I saw the same results on the following Saturday, Sunday, and Tuesday mornings. Tuesday afternoon I took a urine test for employment purposes and on Friday I found out I failed it. 5 Panel DOT test which is a 50ng cutoff, same as this test. I've used these in the past with success but not this time and never again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Passed my drug screen based on this test. The Test (T) line can be super faint sometimes but even a faint line is a pass. I am a heavy user of high potency distillates and I stopped for 27 days (6'0, 215 lbs) and I was clean around day 14 according to this test. Don't guess, just get these and be confident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Mental Health.
customer_reviews.text: Previously used to live in a legal area. Quit for more than two months since I moved to a new area and where it’s illegal. Applied for a job and wanted to double check and confirm what my results would be. Was delivered on a Saturday night (7-9pm) and took the test. Results were positive. Took multiple test throughout Sunday night and Monday morning and most were positive and few were negative. Believed I was going to fail on Monday which was the proposed day to take an preemployment drug test. Short story short I was all negative and this test gave me unnecessary anxiety. Reduce your stress and buy a higher quality test.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Addison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for kids writing reviews for this saying it gives false positives! It works.
customer_reviews.author: Keldanja75

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must for detoxing on a schedule!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to track how long it took me to detox. After about 25days being clean from being a HEAVY smoker I started passing with a light water Intake. Good for peace of mind with a drug test in the future
customer_reviews.author: Shane Schoepke

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It might pass you at home but don’t rely on it if you have to take a test elsewhere. I passes Three at home on three different days and still failed at court.
customer_reviews.author: Serenaturner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They all come up negative even though I smoked the biggest joint the night before
customer_reviews.author: Jorge villarraga

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: I have been testing with these for over two months now and have gotten too many readings that were inconsistent. I think your money would be better spent on a 4 or 5 strip test if you want more accurate readings. I know what my level is at because of a professional UA test result and was trying to maintain a certain level for medical purposes. I even tested it before it went to lab and sometimes they would show negative at the 50ng cutoff and I was definitely over that because DR ran lab test. I was trying to keep it over then under.
customer_reviews.author: therockkhrd

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE BUYING
customer_reviews.text: NEW REVIEW PLEASE READ: Took these at home used on the first urine of the day and was passing, 4 days in a row pass pass pass. Plus had been 34 days since last use. I peed in a cup for my laboratory urine drug screen and even tested the EXACT sample that was sent to the lab and passed according to this kit. I FAILED MY DRUG TEST. These are NOT accurate. Do NOT buy. Buy the more expensive accurate ones at Walgreens. Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I guess they work.
customer_reviews.text: I smoke a lot and only detoxed for 3 days and used a detox drink before using the tests. I used 6. 1 every half hour. The second line to show negative by the 6th one was super faint. My employment dt was the next day and I passed.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Whatever this tests for, it is NOT THC
customer_reviews.text: Like several others, I used this tests to self-check between official tests — while avoiding any contact with THC or related compounds, even secondhand. This test continued to register positive for a full week after my doctor’s office tested 49 ng/ml. This test might be measuring ph, or sugar, or some random protein — any of which could explain why some people get endless false negatives and others endless false positives. PLEASE don’t trust this test, especially if you’re a paren testing your kid. This test WILL NOT TELL YOU ANYTHING. However it might ruin your relationship with your kid, if you punish them for a false positive.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Phew Jonny!  Up in the clear and workin at my new job!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah boy, got a new job son. Like these things, on the cheap and work good. Interesting to find that THC metabolites don't stay in the urine nearly as long as I thought. Or made to think my government anti-free thinkers perhaps. Give yourself about 5 days if you're a once a weeker. Double that if you do a few times a week. Or buy the strips and know fo sho!
customer_reviews.author: Benny HaHa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: This test sucks. It test negative with water too. Don’t be fooled. Water should at least show up as invalid
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Look For The "Max" line or "Mark". There isn't one.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be nice tests but the instructions leave a lot to be desired. When looking for the "Max" line or "Marked line" so that you don't dip the strip too far into the urine you're not going to find it because it's not there. The strips have NO "maximum dip" mark on either side. the strips are blank. That's why I gave it only two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sichuan

customer_reviews.title: Great for preliminary use only. NOT A LAB GRADE TEST
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward tests only for thc. I used this to test myself before taking a DOT physical for a commercial driver's license. It took just over 30 days for my pee to be clean. The results show up fairly quickly, each test is individually wrapped to prevent contaminate. Two lines clean, one line dirty. Can't get any simpler than that. This is not a lab grade test, so I waited until I had 5 passing tests before I took my physical. Remember, it's not the tests fault it's not 100% accurate, it's your fault you smoked that weed.
customer_reviews.author: Trick Shot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not the same result as with a professional kit test taken for new job.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Passed these tests 6 times still failed for employment
customer_reviews.text: These tests are easy to use and might be pretty accurate, but I still failed pre-employment drug screen. Here's why: I was clean 5.5 weeks. I took 6 of these tests, passed every time with a faint line. Took the pre-employment drug screen fairly confident. Learned a few days later I still failed and lost the job opportunity. After questioning the HR representative, learned that I tested at 50 ng/ ml (which is level these tests screen for) but employer tests for as low as 20ng/ml. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous W

customer_reviews.title: They WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant after the mixed reviews but am pleased that they worked. I am a 5’3” 130lb female for reference. I have not had anything containing THC in 2.5 weeks and I was getting a faint line (far left test) but was still worried I wouldn’t pass a pre-employment test. I was still not getting a clear line the morning of the test so I purchased a Qcarbo detox drink. After drinking the detox and 32 oz of water I peed twice. The second pee is the middle test strip. I saved my third pee for the test, which is the darkest test on the far right. Am very pleased with these tests!
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to prepare for a screening due to a new job. The results are very inconsistent. I’ll get a negative result one day and a positive the next. Don’t count on them if you want an accurate result. The day after I tested positive I had my new job screening and was nervous due to the result Dom these strips. I passed the screening. These are not worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Grozier

customer_reviews.title: Spot on if your looking to test for 20 and they never fail you!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these now for @ a year. I get tested once a week and I take a few puffs everyday and have to be very careful and drink water the day before...one I'm not suggesting for ppl to do this. This is just my situation and I can say for shure 100% they have never failed me! As long as you have a faint line your good and the darker even better but since I smoke everyday I've never seen the darker line lol but these test at 20 and if that's what you need dont hesitate to buy these! I buy every month! Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Helps you study for the big test
customer_reviews.text: I needed to know if I was clean after abstaining for a couple weeks. Worked perfect. Now I don't need to worry about my upcoming pre employment screen.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Pass, pass, pass, then take the one that counts , and fail..
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible, they must of been put out by cops to fool people into thinking your clean so you can take the real one and fail..besides the standard ng/ml isn't 50 anymore..it's 20 or less..do yourself a favor and stop screwing everyone over..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to take a drug test through quest diagnostics at the same cut off level as these. Passed with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Abner

customer_reviews.title: Kids
customer_reviews.text: My sixteen-year-old decided to enjoy the Cannabis and i caught him. Now I do random drug tests on him I know they work because I have a friend come to visit me from Hawaii who smokes 24/7 I made him test it and it this test strip lit up like the 4th of July. I will continue to buy this product until my son moves out of the house
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Tests
customer_reviews.text: These tests work, I am a regular mmj smoker and i have tested myself when i am clean and dirty. Test has helped me keep track and monitor my own timespan needed to be clean for employer tests. I have purhased these multiple times and will continue to use them until mmj is not treated as a harmful substace and is excepted in the workplace.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Work as described. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: They are packaged individually (15) with very clear instructions easy to use and very clear results. I tested these myself with 2 other brands that were more expensive and these are the best I have used. For the price there hard to beat. I will be buying them again. Highly recommended for THC ONLY
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and help calm my nerves
customer_reviews.text: I got laid off from my job very unexpectedly and had to find a job. I was a casual smoker, 2/3 times a week. I was very nervous about drug testing so I stopped the day I found out I was laid off. It took me about 3 weeks to get clean according to these tests. I took a labcorp drug test for a job not to long after and passed! I recommend these. They are easy to use and helped me know when it was safe to pass a drug test naturally without changing my diet/exercise level or anything weird. I am 5’5 at about 190/200lbs and smoked about 2/3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: I think they work..
customer_reviews.text: Seem pretty accurate. I was curious how fast I could get clean. I only use lightly on the weekend and not all day either. I tested clean before hand with the first one test and first pee of the day. Pretty accurate for 7 days considering I drink over a gallon of water a day, fairly active and eat very healthy(been like this for years well before I decided to use in moderation). However, it did seem strange to test negative the night and day after. ALTHOUGH, the line on Monday morning was pretty faint. So something must be showing up. Tested each day after and the passing line is getting darker again. So yeah, I'd say they are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: abstract⁴now

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: I eat CBD gummies three times a day and they changed my life but I always worry about failing a drug test. I only buy high quality CBD products that are expensive for that very reason. I took several test and passed them but that second line was just barely there saying you passed. My only gripe is that second line. It has the same cut off that the drug test I have to take which is a strict test. A lot of employer drug test will allow more THC then what this test does. But it's better to be safe then fired from your job.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Greene

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: My son was caught smoking marijuana with friends, so I ordered the drug tests. I told my son he was going to be grounded from his car for a month and would only get it back if he had a clean drug test. The tests arrived a few days after I caught my son stoned. I had him take the test as a control. The tests came up negative for marijuana! I had him urinate in a cup and I administered the test myself, the test still came up negative. Apparently the test doesn’t pick up on lower levels of marijuana in urine.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McClure

customer_reviews.title: Picks up trace amounts of thc in cbd oil!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Wanted to know if thc can be found in people taking cbd oil....yes, yes it can!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Took multiple tests that came up with a very faint ...
customer_reviews.text: Took multiple tests that came up with a very faint negative line. Still failed lab drug test. Wouldn't trust these 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: These tests are accurate. I was skeptical at first as I tested negative only 4 days after a smoke session (although I should note I’m more of a once or twice per week smoker anyway). Took one pull Saturday night, Sunday morning took another test and I was positive. Used surejell masking agent and two hours later it showed a faint negative line. Three days later and I’m negative again, except the line is darker. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Shea

customer_reviews.title: These worked good. I passed this test (with a faint line) ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked good. I passed this test (with a faint line) and I also passed my lab test that was sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen912

customer_reviews.title: WOOOOOO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I’m a piece of garbage. Like, a straight up dumpster fire. These little hunnies right here saved my sanity. I have “random” drug tests but I know when they’ll be so I can plan ahead. I’ve spent a couple years thinking I had to stop smoking for a month to get clean for a drug test. PLOT TWIST.. 4 days, baby, and my urine is shining bright like a diamond (aka: no THC). My dumpster fire persona blew up in ecstasy when I found out that revolutionary information. You know what they say... work smarter, not harder. Buy these tests.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: Negative !
customer_reviews.text: If you’d rather order these than wait about a week for one at your clinic, I’d say go for it! I tested twice just to make sure and both came back negative. I’m hoping that these are 100% accurate because I have a drug screening test due for a job. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Lizaida Santiago

customer_reviews.title: These are not accurate at all...AT ALL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolute trash garbage bs piles of lies..took three had bold double lines. Then take the one that matters..and fail absolute fail, fail as hard as these waste of time and money. do yourself a favor and eat your money or stick it up your ass..that's more accurate that anything these will tell you..seriously STAY AWAY. Clean for well over a month and they said I was negative. What a joke. They should be ashamed for even selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: kaitywhales

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was great. I did the test, it came back negative, as I thought it would since I haven't smoked in over a month. Then for ha-ha's, by boyfriend, who had just smoked (and has been smoking for awhile), took the test and it also came back negative. Sadly, I can't trust this product for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the low cost of this product. CVS, Walgreens and Walmart had a single (1) test priced at $19.00. This box contains 15 strips. Make sure you pull off the end cap before dipping. I did not do that the first time and got a blank white test. The second time when I followed the instructions it worked like a charm. I did two test together with same results.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Only real result was unneeded anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Needed to take a preemployment screening, so I ordered these to ease my mind. Terrible mistake. It came a day late, after I had already taken the lab test. These said I was positive three times over the course of 36 hours, so I was obviously incredibly distraught. Short story: I passed the lab result, even at DOT levels, so these are absolute garbage. I tested on 96-degree water, and it was negative, not invalid. I tested on a regular smoker who smoked the night before, and they were negative. Save your money and your mental wellbeing and avoid these at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: ENDED UP WITH A DEFECTIVE TEST. DON'T TRUST THESE.
customer_reviews.text: Took the test a few times all came up positive. Took the test another time a few weeks later and got a negative result. Thought all was good until I decided to test again a week before my official test and it came up positive again. Assuming the one test was defective. I'm super irritated considering I thought I was good to go and clearly am not. DON'T RECOMMEND BUYING. DEFECTIVE TESTS.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Colson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Works Good, I tried it the day of my urinalysis & got a Negative reading, Meaning No traces of product in my system. Urinalysis was the Same Reading. Negative. Ty, Excellent Product & Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Unreadable and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is very hard to read, even my wife tried it and it’s not showing clear enough. The pink ribbon barely shows through for negative results, I feel it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Smoked regularly for years and failed my first test. Took a detox drink and passed the test like expected. After the detox wore off I failed the test again as expected. Roommate has been clean for 3 weeks and he already tested negative which he expected. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: need negative results
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it reads cbd as having thc. My cbd from Hemp Bombs has 3rdparty testing and contains zero thc. I contacted mfg of the test and the info I got is it can read cbd as postitive. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Themom182

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust
customer_reviews.text: These tests don't work. Don't trust them. I used these within a day or two of consuming and all the tests came back negative. I do not trust this result at all. The last test tonight was a very strong negative. I have no confidence that I'm actually free of detectable THC. Going to have to but some tests from a more reputable source now. No way to return these either. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and emotions.
customer_reviews.text: They were all not reliable for testing. Each strip gave a different result. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: RSF

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously unreliable! I tested myself and a daily smoker today- mine was negative as I expected but so was the daily smokers? They took 2 more and both said negative, but there's no way. Dollar tree tests are way more accurate, don't count on these.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: If it's visible its negative.
customer_reviews.text: I just had a pre-employment drug test from Labcorp, I used one of these tests at the same time. it came back negative within a minute, but the line was so faint I was worried. Well I ended up passing the Labcorp test. As long as you see the negative result within the 5 minutes and you don't have to use a magnifying glass to see it should be negative.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great For Your Next Drug Test Party With Your 14 Closest Friends
customer_reviews.text: I never did use this product (I am squeamish about urinating in front of myself), but I finally gave it to a friend, and he got great results! Get this: my friend, who I will call Smokin' Gary, quit smokin'. Then he used the product and tested clean. Then he was tested by one of those places that hire people, and he tested clean there, too! What a miracle! His mind was at ease due to the assurance provided by the Easy@Home Marijuana (THC) Single Panel Drug Tests Kit. Get those 14 friends together (or 14 acquaintances... nobody has that many friends) and test the night away!
customer_reviews.author: Was Two

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for 2 years now, works wonders every-time! A faint line is still passing people, while a faint line means there is still a little bit present in your system, you will still pass! A faint line can also mean multiple things, such as pH imbalance, or other medications (not drugs) in your system.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Nystrom

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to see If I was clean after smoking , I waited 4 weeks and it still showed I was positive, after 2 months it still show I was positive, I asked my girlfriend who doesn't smoke and for her It was positive . Just a gimmick maybe to try out on you kids to make sure their telling you their honest
customer_reviews.author: rick albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Solid tests
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to work great. I had a preemployment drug screening and wanted to ensure I had nothing to worry about. I took these tests every day leading up to the test which was for 50 ng/l and passed them all as well as the test I took in the lab so I would say they are accurate!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Maybe they work
customer_reviews.text: These might work. Here’s my experience with the product. So I had never smoked until this covid pandemic. By the time I ever wanted to smoke I was in a job that testes randomly and didn’t want to take chances. So I got laid off for a couple months and gave these and pot a try. I smoked 3 times and took 5-7 edibles, no idea on the thc content of any of it, in a 3 week span. In that time I was exercising and drinking plenty of water, but I would think it would have been enough to fail a test. To be fair I did not take any first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: William Owens III

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, stopped smoking a little over three weeks ago and got a semi dark line. Had a buddy take one who's been smoking daily and the line was completely invisible so that gives validity to the faintest line is a pass. The line seems to get darker the longer you are clean. Used them last year and passed a lab test.
customer_reviews.author: Chase B.

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: It kept reading positive for marijuana... Then when I went in for testing (for work) I was clean... So they are not too accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Moe

customer_reviews.title: recommend if you're curious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make sure i was clean while looking for jobs. I havent taken any thc for nearly a month and very clearly showed 2 lines meaning negative. Gave to one other who hadnt in almost 2 weeks and had the faintest line so seemed on verge of postive while the third person had stopped for 3 days and absolutely no second line showing at all. If you are worried about results still, i would suggest doing every day for maybe a week since metabolites can sometimes appear at different times if still in system. Overall, it is cheaper than others. Really simple to use and results seemed correct since tested on others.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent test
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like it was okay but in the end I found this product is inconsistent. January 16th 2020 was the last day I smoked i am writing this review on Feburary 29th 2020. I did get two that said negative but just took it again about 10 minutes ago from the time I typed this and it shows positive. I did notice the top line that's show positive was pink instead of red like usual.
customer_reviews.author: Brett deadrich

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the product was inconsistent with all three attempts they ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the product was inconsistent with all three attempts they all had different readings and could not be trusted.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castillon

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 3 I have lost 97lbs. It was 3 years ago when I lived in Arizona, and had a medical marijuana license, that I smoked. I was applying for a new job, that even does hair test. I wanted to be overly sure I would pass a urine sample test. This test still comes up positive on all 15 test that I spread out over a 7 week period. I went to a clinic, and paid for a urine test from them. Obviously it came back Negative. I’m pretty sure I was doing the home test correctly. Don’t use this product, it’s not reliable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C

customer_reviews.title: How long it takes to get clean
customer_reviews.text: FOR PPL TRYING TO GET CLEAN FAST- I smoke like a fiend I'm talking weed/wax/edibles daily! It takes 10 days for me to get clean I'm 6'1 180 pounds, VERY active I do jitjitsu every other day and drink apple cider vinegar n alkaline water daily. Hope this helps. Screw probation....
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: DONT TRUST
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT trust this brand. It can be a life ruiner. Compared my sample to two other major brands and they showed completely different results. This brand showed a faint line (indicating negative result) while others threw a hard positive.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Freaner

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Just got a negative test result off these tests after not smoking for one day. I’m an every day smoker. I used the second void of the day and it was super yellow concentrated pee so dilution isn’t a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Period.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR $$ we purchased these for our 15 year old son who thinks it’s okay to smoke weed. A kid that went from straight A student to Failing classes and lacking all motivation. He “passed” according to the test strip. It wasn’t convincible, we caught him again took the test and boom looked as though he passed when we knew it was the ultimate fail. Seriously, do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylah

customer_reviews.title: Totally inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually give reviews, but I had to for this product because it was a complete waste of money. I have taken five tests from the pack of fifteen just to get a baseline of where I’m at and have PASSED all five...each time anywhere between 1-6 days after smoking. I’d love to think I metabolize thc that quickly, but let’s be real, these tests suck.
customer_reviews.author: Maren

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good, unreliable
customer_reviews.text: have purchased these tests before with good results. New test is unreliable. One day negative, next day positive. twice in same day one positive one negative! Still showing some positives a month later.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Great detector of the devil's cabbage
customer_reviews.text: Accurate enough for me to know that my step son has been smoking the devils lettus. If you too have someone in your life you suspect has been partaking in smokable cabbage this is a way to make a case.
customer_reviews.author: Wicky

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Most jobs use 50NG and these are super affordable and when you pass the test it is very obvious. The line is visible enough to not have doubts about it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Teenagers...god love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because 1 drug test at Walgreens was $20! Great for when you need one right away, but these work great! Kid is grounded until he can pass the drug test! And with 15 for $10 I can afford to check him weekly until that happens and be able to random test when need be!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Raper

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a week after I started my job search. The first test was inconclusive, so I figured it was a positive. The next two I took the weeks afterwards and it read as a negative. I was skeptical about the results and decided to read the reviews, which did not ease my mind. As a heavy smoker, I figured THC was not clear out of my system. I opted to buy a different brand in person a month after I purchased these and I got a clear positive result. DO NOT TRUST THIS PRODUCT EVEN IF THE PRICE IS TEMPTING. THEY WILL GIVE YOU FALSE HOPE. THEY DO NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Stoney Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: From this day forward - this product will be my go-to home kit process. I've been using it for a good 1 1/2 since I stopped and I have no complaints. I will definitely recommend. I tested myself every Wednesday. Tested other people in my family who haven't touched marijuana since God knows when ... Results are accurate. Do be weary of ghost lines though if you are a frequent smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - FALSE RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: 1 day after smoking marijuana, used this test and I tested POSITIVE. 3 days after, I tested NEGATIVE and thought I was clean. Tested again 7 days after smoking marijuana to make sure, still said I was NEGATIVE. Went to the clinic for an official urine drug test for work 8 days after smoking and tested POSITIVE. Clearly these tests do not accurately live up to the clinical lab tests for detecting results longer than 3 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Luke I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pre-employment urine test coming up, so I needed to monitor when my THC levels dropped below 50 ng/ml. These are easy to use with simple directions, and the results show up quite clearly one way or the other. Great price for a 15-pack, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mikah McCabe

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: I used these prior to a lab drug test while doing the B.N.G. Herbal Clean Premium Detox 7 Day Kit. Once a faint line appeared in the T section I was greatly relieved. I tested myself about two times a day to see when the best time to take the test would be. I also could get just the right amount of water in my system so my urine wasn't too diluted so it was clear.
customer_reviews.author: ZoeZoeZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: They worked great tried on someone who definitely would be positive to make sure and everything went well for the regular test definitely worth the money for these ones!!!
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: great test
customer_reviews.text: the test were fairly cheap and they were accurate i took 2 just to be safe in case of error on one and it worked it said i was clean which when i went to the clinic the next day i passed my drug test. helped me know if the thc had gotten out of my system.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo G

customer_reviews.title: Clear instructions; hard to decide if negative or positive.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken 3 drugs tests so far and all of the results have come out as this. Now even though the line at the bottom is faint, I’m having concerns on whether or not that means I’m positive or negative.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Burks

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. Easier to use for men.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use if you're a guy but if you're a female you need to have a receptacle to get enough urine on it to get a good read. They seemed to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Blayk M

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate; Gave false results
customer_reviews.text: I used these tests up until the day before my work drug test, and it showed me as a “preliminary fail” the entire time. I followed the directions each time, and same results for 5 tests. I hadn’t used any marijuana products for approximately a month, and they showed fail each time. Then I went in to work, and I passed their urine drug test. These are not accurate, and will not provide you with peace of mind if you’re concerned about the validity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR ALL THC USERS!
customer_reviews.text: These work good as hell took me 2 weeks to clean my system, use one soon as you get it knowing you dirty so you can get the hang of things. I quit but had to test myself for my upcoming DOT test for truck drivers I was skeptical and nervous BUT PASSED LIKE A MF!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using these dip cards. I bought them for a pre-employment drug test and was a regular smoker of about half a doobie a night. It took me about 5 days to see a faint second line, and it darkened every day after that. I took my drug screen, a 5 panel ecup urinalysis, on day 12 of no smoking and was offered the job 3 days later. I did nothing more than my normal morning walk and water throughout the day. You can trust them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I took this test after smoking the night before, so that I could track my THC levels (trying to get a new job). It tested negative.. so I had my husband, who had literally smoked a few minutes beforehand, take one and it also tested negative. Everything else about it was great though (ease of use, clear instructions..).
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hunt

customer_reviews.title: These are not accurate. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 15 pack of these on the 2nd of October, to get a good reading on how much THC is left in my system. I am on day 35 without THC. I have gotten a negative testing, followed by a completely positive testing. Out of the 7 I have taken, 3 are positive and 4 are negative. Testing negative sometimes and then positive after. These are AWFUL test kits and I have no clue how they get almost 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Demers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to test
customer_reviews.text: Easy to test, (once I figured out I had to take the cap off) Inexpensive and quick. My company announced they would be random testing soon and it was nice to have peace of mind that when it happens for me I'll pass. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: melpaco

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: Tested myself and came back positive (to be expected). Tested my gf who does not consume and within 60s results came back negative.
customer_reviews.author: nattyx

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Got me clean to get a job at a drug store. Get weed free it will change your life I promise. I have more energy now than ever. Very accurate results. A negative is a negative so trust the test even if the line is faint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This test is NOT accurate
customer_reviews.text: I took one and I haven’t used any thc for 2 weeks it came back negative. One of my coworkers did one and she’s never had any thc and hers came back negative. Another one of my coworkers did this one and she smoked thc and has been eating thc edibles for months. The last time she did was 2 days ago and her test came back negative. These are NOT accurate! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Who me?

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tested marijuana user vs non user and tests were accurate. Used to test family member prior to pre-employment drug screening. Even though this test showed a faint line on the test line, it was still a negative reading. Pre-employment screening, which also tested for thc at 50 ng, was negative as well. I would highly recommend this product to give peace of mind to anyone uncertain about a thc drug screening.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nastepniak

customer_reviews.title: worked good.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect, priced right and in fact priced very low compared to other type test strips, ie the ones for alcohol are expensive??? They should all be the same price imo. but they do work, if you know how to read the marks that is, plus should'nt leave negative feedback because you dont know how to read marks. Anyway, these are best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: saf4amazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: they suck period
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give these a try. I normally clean out within 6 days no matter how much I smoke (even concentraits) and these have been saying I've been dirty 3 weeks after quiting so I went and got the tests I normally get that are very accurate to compare them. The other test was from the dollar tree for just a dollar. Like I said I've used them before and was never steered wrong. These easy at home tests are throwing up false positives i won't highly not recommend this product to anyone. The cheaper ones are more accurate than these claim to be so don't waste your time or money trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley B

customer_reviews.title: Good for bulk but hard to rely on
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem with cheap home tests is the ability to actually read them. These aren’t as bad as what you’d get at dollar general but I guess they’ll do. Just wait until you actually think you’re clean and buy a good one off Amazon or at Walgreens. These are nice because you get so many
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use works great now I know when I can pass a piss test or not at work right now I'll fail it so I'm being extra careful because I control an overheat crain and lift things weighing over 3000 lbs
customer_reviews.author: chris jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: This test kit does not work. The kit I received is Lot W01980402 with an expiration date of 04/23/2020. I used this kit 7 times over the course of several weeks and each time it came back negative even though I had smoked weed. I was suspicious so I bought a different brand from e*bay. I smoked weed, waited a couple of days and took both tests. This kit, Easy@Home, again showed negative. The new kit accurately came back positive. Both tests had the same cut-off level. Don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: These tests are advertised as having a cutoff of 50 ng/ml which means if you are UNDER 50 ng/ml then you should be testing NEGATIVE. I have not smoked in close to 2 months and purchased this 15 pack of tests to track when I was ready to take a pre-employment test for a new job. The lab reported back to me that the sample I provided on the FIFTH (10/5/2020) showed a result of 33 ng/ml ... yet this test I just took on the 14th (10/14/2020) still shows me as positive, indicating that I am still over 50 ng/ml ... DO NOT TRUST THIS TEST, IT IS INACCURATE
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: After you figure out how to read them, these are great test strips! This is my third reorder. The confusing part is that I thought the second pink line needed to be strong and bright. That's not true. You only need the faintest pink line for you to fall within UA passing guidelines. I used Strip, a masking/detox agent, checked my urine with the test strips and it had a very faint pink line. I immediately took my required UA and passed. In my experience, they've worked great!
customer_reviews.author: eflair

customer_reviews.title: These are accurate
customer_reviews.text: These are accurate. If you fail this, you will fail a test at Labcorp or AnyTestNow. If you pass this, you will pass at those labs.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Feeling like I wasted my money. Husband tried them to make sure he was clean for a new job. First test out of the box came out invalid. No lines anywhere. So he tried another and it came back negative. Which is great... BUT I'm a smoker and tried one for the hell of it. Knowing I smoked the night before so I should fail... But guess what? I passed. Hmmm How is that possible?
customer_reviews.author: Casey L

customer_reviews.title: Have Teenagers? you need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you got teenagers get'm! Buy some gloves too. Stand next to the bathroom door, incase they try to turn on the water.. Work great at catching the "Sneaky Teenagers " Visine dont cover this up..lol
customer_reviews.author: Drdamewood

customer_reviews.title: Light lines mean passing
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I took very many throughout many days and the line was always very light, which is the only thing that really bothered me. But, on the day of my exam I took one of these, had a light line that I could barely see, so it made me really nervous. But passed my test with no detox. They work! Don’t listen to the bad reviews. Very accurate. I was worried about the darkness of the line like many, but passed my test! I had 4 edibles in a month span and was clean in 21 days. 220 pounds, 5’4, with light exercise every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem precise, probably accurate. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Never ended up getting tested, but I could see 1. When I was above cutoff, no line for over a week 2. After I was past cutoff, each day the line becoming less faint. 3. When I was further past cutoff, approaching the control line. Easy to use and helped me stay clean just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Howard

product_meta.title: 15 Pack Easy@Home Marijuana (THC) Single Panel Drug Tests Kit - #EDTH-114
feature_bullets: More than 99% accurate in detecting specific drugs according to the designated cut-off levels
Easy to use-just dip the test into urine and read results, 2 lines appears if clean, 1 control line only appears if not clean;
FDA Cleared and CLIA Waived for OTC use;

Minimum and Maximum detection time for each drug show typically how quick and how long the urine drug test can detect this drug in urine sample. The detection time varies greatly depending on the how often and how much of drug use as well as metabolism rate of each person. Please refer to the product instruction for detection window of each drug.
Same science used as Lab screen test; More tests with lower cost than retailers offer;
